name: xgboost-train
label: XGBoost Classification Train
description: Component is responsible for running XGBoost training on synthetic data which is created by using scikit's make_classification method. Data creation is inclusive inside the component itself.

arguments.label: Least AUC Requirement
arguments.description: If AUC goes below given threshold, raise alert.

arguments.label: Max KS Threshold Requirement
arguments.description: If KS goes above given threshold, raise alert.

arguments.label: Least PSI Requirement
arguments.description: If PSI goes below given threshold, raise alert.

arguments.label: Number of Estimators
arguments.description: Number of boosted trees to fit.

arguments.label: Max Depth
arguments.description: Maximum tree depth for base learners.

arguments.label: Min Child Weight
arguments.description: Minimum sum of instance weight(hessian) needed in a child.

arguments.label: Objective
arguments.description: Specify the learning task and the corresponding learning objective.

arguments.label: Gamma
arguments.description: Minimum loss reduction required to make a further partition on a leaf node of the tree.

arguments.label: Max Delta Step
arguments.description: Maximum delta step we allow each tree’s weight estimation to be.

arguments.label: Subsample
arguments.description: Subsample ratio of the training instance.

arguments.label: Scale Pos Weight
arguments.description: Balancing of positive and negative weights.

arguments.label: Input Data File
arguments.description: File to use for inference. If file is provided, then data will not be synthetic.

arguments.label: Model output file
arguments.description: File to use for saving the trained model
